message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, $9000 is still a bit below my desired price point.  I'm willing to come down to $9250.  This would give us both a good deal.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9100.
